mapper.select: SELECT db_use_id, attr_id, attr_name, numbering, display_check, case_page_id FROM view_pageattr WHERE case_page_id = #{displayId} GROUP BY db_use_id, attr_id, attr_name, numbering, display_check, case_page_id ORDER BY numbering, display_check DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_page_attr SET attr_content = #{attrContent} WHERE page_use_id = (SELECT page_use_id FROM view_pageattr WHERE page_id = #{pageId} AND attr_id = 'CAL' AND attr_name = '날짜')
